text: Robert J. Brown (June 15, 1935 - November 14, 2020) was an American educator and politician. Brown was born in Stillwater, Minnesota. He was a member of the Minnesota Senate from 1967 to 1976. He was a Republican. Brown died at his home in Roseville, Minnesota on November 14, 2020 at the age of 85.Minnesota Legislators Past & Present-Robert J. BrownDr. Robert J.
